message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $95. It's in great condition and you know it's worth $100 to you. Let me know if you're interested!
I'm interested, but I was thinking more along the lines of $85. I've seen similar products going for lower prices elsewhere.
Hey Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I can't go that low. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $90.  It's still a good deal for both of us. What do you say?
I'm not sure I can go that high, but I'll meet you halfway from my previous offer. How about $87.50?
